servux.command.info.click_to_reset_to: Click to reset to default value: %s
servux.config.servux_main.default_permis: The permission level required to access the data provider
servux.config.servux_main.permission_lev: The permission level required for the Easy Place operation
The permission level required for the Admin operation (not used)
The permission level required for the data provider (not used)
servux.config.litematic_data.permission_: The permission level required for the Litematics data provider
The permission level required for the Litematics paste operation
servux.config.litematic_data.fix_rail_ro: Enable / Disable the fixing of Rail Rotations when Rails are rotated 180 degrees.
servux.config.entity_data.permission_lev: The permission level required for the Entity data provider, will send entity data to clients with this permission level
servux.config.entity_data.nbt_query_over: Override the default ops level 2 permissions for NbtQuery packets, and set the permissions using "nbt_query_permission_level"
servux.config.entity_data.nbt_query_perm: The permission level required for Nbt Query Packets when "nbt_query_override" is enabled
servux.config.debug_data.permission_leve: The permission level required for the Entity data provider, will send entity data to clients with this permission level
servux.config.debug_data.debug_enabled.c: A configurable list of Debug Info Senders
servux.config.debug_data.server_developm: Enable the Vanilla "isDevelopmentMode" flag to on
servux.config.scroller_data.permission_l: The permission level required for the Scroller data provider
The permission level required for the MiniHUD data provider
servux.config.hud_data.update_interval.c: The update interval in ticks for the hud data provider, will check for new weather data, etc this often
servux.config.hud_data.share_weather_sta: Enable / Disable the sharing of the Server's Weather with MiniHUD for the Weather display
servux.config.hud_data.weather_permissio: Permissions Required for sharing the weather data
servux.config.hud_data.share_seed.name: Share World Seed
servux.config.hud_data.share_seed.commen: Enable / Disable the sharing of the World Seed with MiniHUD for the Slime Chunk Display
servux.config.hud_data.seed_permission_l: Permissions Required for sharing the World Seed
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.p: The permission level required for the Structure Bounding Boxes data provider
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.s: A list of structures to exclude from the Structure Bounding Boxes data provider
Whether to enable the structures blacklist
A list of structures to include in the Structure Bounding Boxes data provider
Whether to enable the structures whitelist
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.t: The timeout in ticks for the Structure Bounding Boxes data provider, will resend the bounding box data after this many ticks
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.u: The update interval in ticks for the Structure Bounding Boxes data provider, will check for new chunks to send bounding box data for this often
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.s: Enable / Disable the sharing of the Server's Weather with MiniHUD for the Weather display
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.w: Permissions Required for sharing the weather data
servux.config.structure_bounding_boxes.s: Enable / Disable the sharing of the World Seed with MiniHUD for the Slime Chunk Display
Permissions Required for sharing the World Seed
